data.name: CreateCsePersonAccount
ReadCaseUnit
data.value: select top(1) CU_NUMBER, CAS_NO, CSP_NO_AR, CSP_NO_AP, CSP_NO_CHILD from CKT_CASE_UNIT where (CSP_NO_AP = @cspNoAp) and ( (@cspNoChild = CSP_NO_CHILD) or (@cspNoChild = CSP_NO_AR) )

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCsePersonSupported
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC where CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber

data.name: ReadDebtDetail
data.value: select distinct T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OTR_GENERATED_ID, T1.OTY_TYPE, T1.OTR_TYPE, T1.CVRD_PRD_START_DT, T1.CVD_PRD_END_DT, T1.CREATED_BY from CKT_OB_TRN T2 join CKT_DEBT_DTL T1 on (T2.OTY_TYPE = T1.OTY_TYPE) and (T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.OB_TRN_TYP = T1.OTR_TYPE) and (T2.OB_TRN_ID = T1.OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.CPA_TYPE = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.OTY_TYPE = @otyType) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (T2.CPA_SUP_TYPE is not null) and (T2.CSP_SUP_NUMBER = @cspSupNumber)

data.name: ReadDebtDetailObligation
data.value: select distinct T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OTR_GENERATED_ID, T1.OTY_TYPE, T1.OTR_TYPE, T1.CVRD_PRD_START_DT, T1.CVD_PRD_END_DT, T1.CREATED_BY, T2.CPA_TYPE, T2.CSP_NUMBER, T2.OB_ID, T2.DTY_GENERATED_ID, T2.OTHER_STATE_ABBR, T2.OB_DSC, T2.HISTORY_IND, T2.PRIM_SEC_CD, T2.CREATED_BY, T2.CREATED_TMST, T2.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T2.LAST_UPDATE_TMST, T2.ORD_TYP_CD from CKT_OBLIGATION T2 join CKT_OB_TRN T3 join CKT_DEBT_DTL T1 on (T3.OTY_TYPE = T1.OTY_TYPE) and (T3.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T3.OB_TRN_TYP = T1.OTR_TYPE) and (T3.OB_TRN_ID = T1.OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (T3.CPA_TYPE = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (T3.CSP_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T3.CPA_SUP_TYPE is not null) and (T3.CSP_SUP_NUMBER = @cspSupNumber) on (T2.DTY_GENERATED_ID = T3.OTY_TYPE) and (T2.OB_ID = T3.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = T3.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.CPA_TYPE = T3.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.DTY_GENERATED_ID = @dtyGeneratedId) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (T2.OB_ID <> @obId)

data.name: ReadObligCollProtectionHist
data.value: select top(1) T1.DEACTIVATION_DATE, T1.CREATED_TMST, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OTY_IDENTIFIER, T1.OBG_IDENTIFIER from CKT_OB_TYPE T4 join CKT_OB_COLL_PHIST T1 on (T1.OBG_IDENTIFIER = @obgIdentifier) and (T4.DEBT_TYP_ID = T1.OTY_IDENTIFIER) and (T4.DEBT_TYP_CLASS = @debtTypClass) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (T1.DEACTIVATION_DATE = @deactivationDate)

data.name: ReadObligationType
data.value: select top(1) DEBT_TYP_ID, DEBT_TYP_CD, DEBT_TYP_CLASS from CKT_OB_TYPE where DEBT_TYP_ID = @debtTypId

data.name: ReadSupported
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC where @cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER
